volumeInfo.description: FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING, Fifth Edition is specially designed to help readers see the relevance of accounting, regardless of their chosen major or profession. Simply put, Accounting Matters. Weygandt’s Fifth Edition continues its tradition of preparing accounting majors by providing accurate and thorough coverage of the necessary accounting techniques and concepts.. In addition, the authors have expanded this theme of Accounting Matters to help illustrate the relevance of accounting and the use of accounting information across all business segments.
volumeInfo.title: Financial Accounting

searchInfo.textSnippet: Best of all, instructors can arrange to have eGrade Plus packaged FREE with new copies of financial Accounting, Fifth Edition. All Instructors have to do is adopt the eGrade Plus version of this book and activate their eGrade Plus course.
